statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT currency_symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE volume > 1000000;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE market_cap > 500000000 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT currency_symbol, price, volume FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE volume > 500000 ORDER BY currency_symbol ASC;
SELECT currency_symbol, market_cap FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_price_data ORDER BY date DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT currency_symbol, price, market_cap FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, currency_symbol, price, volume, market_cap FROM cryptocurrency_price_data WHERE market_cap > 1000000000 ORDER BY volume DESC LIMIT 20;
SELECT currency_symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price, AVG(volume) AS avg_volume FROM cryptocurrency_price_data GROUP BY currency_symbol ORDER BY avg_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT AVG(price) AS global_avg_price, AVG(volume) AS global_avg_volume FROM cryptocurrency_price_data;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol='BTC';
SELECT price, symbol FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT timestamp, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, trend_type, trend_score FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_score < 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT symbol, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE symbol = 'BTC' ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT trend_type, MAX(trend_score) AS max_score FROM trend_analysis GROUP BY trend_type ORDER BY max_score DESC
SELECT symbol, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM cryptocurrency_prices GROUP BY symbol HAVING COUNT(symbol) > 1
SELECT * FROM trend_analysis WHERE trend_score BETWEEN 3.5 AND 4.5 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT currency_pair, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT exchange_name, rating FROM exchanges ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_cap WHERE market_rank BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT currency_pair, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT currency_pair, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT currency_pair, price, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE currency_pair = 'BTC-USD' AND price > 50000
SELECT currency_pair, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE currency_pair LIKE '%BTC%'
SELECT exchange_name, country, rating FROM exchanges ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT crypto_id, market_cap, volume, market_rank FROM market_cap WHERE market_rank <= 100 ORDER BY market_cap DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices;
SELECT currency, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE id = 1;
SELECT currency, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000;
SELECT currency, price, recorded_at FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE recorded_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT currency, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 500 ORDER BY currency ASC;
SELECT currency, trend_type FROM trend_analysis WHERE analyzed_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT currency_from, currency_to, rate FROM exchange_rates WHERE rate < 1.0 AND recorded_at > '2022-02-15';
SELECT currency, forecasted_price, confidence_level FROM forecasting_data WHERE confidence_level > 80 ORDER BY currency, confidence_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY cryptocurrency_name DESC
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_name LIKE 'Bitcoin%'
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE exchange_rate < 1.5 ORDER BY date_updated ASC
SELECT report_title, analysis_result FROM trend_analysis WHERE analysis_date = '2022-07-15'
SELECT cryptocurrency_name, forecasted_price FROM forecasting_data WHERE forecast_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_price DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_prices WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT id, cryptocurrency_name, price FROM cryptocurrency_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_rates WHERE date_updated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT date_recorded, price FROM historical_data WHERE cryptocurrency_name = 'Ethereum' ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT report_title, analysis_date FROM trend_analysis WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(analysis_result) > 100;
